name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.cache.revocation.polling.ms
description:
How often the DataNode should poll to see if the clients have
    stopped using a replica that the DataNode wants to uncache.

name: fs.getspaceused.jitterMillis
description: fs space usage statistics refresh jitter in msec.

name: dfs.blockreport.initialDelay
description:
Delay for first block report in seconds. Support multiple time unit
    suffix(case insensitive), as described in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If
    no time unit is specified then seconds is assumed

name: dfs.webhdfs.netty.high.watermark
description: High watermark configuration to Netty for Datanode WebHdfs.

name: dfs.namenode.blocks.per.postponedblocks.rescan
description:
Number of blocks to rescan for each iteration of
    postponedMisreplicatedBlocks.

name: dfs.client.block.write.retries
description:
The number of retries for writing blocks to the data nodes, 
  before we signal failure to the application.
